name: Stick Figure's Money Frenzy
description:
The stick figure is bored so he wants to go around collecting money. However during his adventure of grabbing money,  obstacles and inconvenient annoyances will get into his way. Jump and use your one frame of basic animation to run and guide this stick figure to grab all the coins in the room. There is also bonus stages for even more money. 

When dealing with some of these annoyances, sometimes there is random pizza sitting there. Grab it as it can make you invincible to these annoying obstacles.

Controls: use the arrow keys to move.

Use the space bar to jump 

(This game is in early access as i may update it in a later date)
